suite.name: Caso Teste

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=MINHA_SESSAO_API, url=https://automationexercise.com/api, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://automationexercise.com/api/brandsList path_url=/api/brandsList headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Numbers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to real numbers.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: API 03: Verifica o Schema/Contrato modelo no caminho
Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Validate Json By Schema File
kw.doc: Validate json object by json schema file. Arguments: - json_object: json as a dictionary object. - json_path: path to file with json schema

kw.name: API 03: Verifica se no retorno vem somente valor esperado
GET On Session
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://automationexercise.com/api/brandsList path_url=/api/brandsList headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Get Dictionary Keys
kw.doc: Returns keys of the given ``dictionary`` as a list.

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Key
kw.doc: Fails if ``key`` is not found from ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.
